txt.en: Instance: Trading Fates
Talk to Thane Mágla
Mágla is in Middlemead.\n\nYou should aid Mágla in escaping Middlemead.
Listen to Mágla
DNT
'What madness has fallen on Middlemead?'
Mágla can be found in the Mead Hall.\n\nYou should travel outside to confront the White Hand with Mágla.
Fight through Middlemead with Thane Mágla
Hildulf can be found at the traders' pavillion in Middlemead.\n\nYou have encountered Hildulf and Uruks, and should now defeat them.
'We must flee, [placeholder]. Let us ride to Edoras, and rejoin with the others.'
You have discovered steeds left unharmed
Travel out of the Mead Hall with Mágla
'Let us flee with haste, [placeholder].'
Thane Mágla has been defeated!
Mágla must be convinced to stand with his people
Defeat Hildulf
After sending his people to safety, Thane Mágla remains behind to defend Middlemead from the White Hand.
The mead can be found on the table.\n\nMágla has asked you to share a drink with him.
Thane Mágla can be found outside the Mead Hall of Middlemead.\n\nYou have escaped the White Hand forces and made your way to the horses. You should speak to Thane Mágla and flee!
Thane Mágla can be found in the Mead Hall of Middlemead.\n\nYou should listen to Thane Mágla.
Horses can be found to the south-east of the traders' pavillion.\n\nYou should now escape Middlemead.
Share mead with Mágla
Mágla can be found at the table.\n\nMágla sees no hope for Rohan. You should disagree with him.
Thane Mágla is sitting at his table.\n\nMágla has asked you to speak with him.
Listen to Thane Mágla
Mágla can be found at the table.\n\nMágla sees no hope for Rohan. You should tell him of your journeys in the Eastemnet.
Tell Mágla <rgb=#FF00FF>no</rgb>
Tell Mágla a <rgb=#FF00FF>story</rgb> of your adventures in the Eastemnet
DNT -- Players will not see
<rgb=#FF00FF>Challenge</rgb> Mágla to lead once more
Mágla can be found at the table.\n\nMágla is beginning to believe that hope remains. You should challenge him.
Mágla is at the table in the Mead Hall of Middlemead.\n\nYou should wait with Mágla as he decides what action to take.
Talk to Thane Mágla
Approach Thane Mágla in the Mead Hall
Flee Middlemead with Thane Mágla
<rgb=#FF0000>Thane Mágla must not be defeated</rgb>
Mágla is in Middlemead.\n\nYou should fight through Middlemead with Mágla.
'Alas for Middlemead! Look what the White Hand has done already!\n\n'We must move swiftly if we are to escape with our lives!'
A din rising outside the Mead Hall signals the arrival of the White Hand
